title: Sann-Remy Chea - Co-founder of Kangurus - Video Games, Web and Tech
description: Sann-Remy has co-founded Kangurus in 2021. He has been working in the gaming industry, as a professional, for more than 12 years.
experience: {{years}} years of experience in top Video Game companies: Activision Blizzard and Ubisoft.
skills: Strong background in Gaming and Web technologies.
